::Ender::
    "That is a bit tricky.  It requires things that I doubt the Predacons can 
do.  The people sent at the base would have to fire off a few rounds and 
retreat.  After a very long time the base would fall.  That is why both sides 
of a war always have casualties, they aren't patient enough.  If you're 
willing to lose a few bots, there is another way.  It has different names 
from different cultures.  The term used by the German Earth culture was 
Blitzkrieg, literally translated it means lightning war.  The principle is to 
avoid trading blows with the enemy.  Hit them hard and fast so that they 
can't recover to hurt you.  Not only does this stop the immediate threat it 
also shocks others into avoiding conflict with you."
